trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料的 paint 事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A ChartPaintEventArgs object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: ChartPaintEventArgs 物件用於設定期間的圖表內容<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>屬性可讓您將圖表元素，而<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>屬性有助於 GDI + 繪圖作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>屬性可讓開發人員存取根<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件，可以用來設定圖表的各種屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Chart property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 圖表屬性可讓開發人員設定期間的圖表內容<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object for the event.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the chart element.
Use this object property during a painting event to: - Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製事件期間使用這個物件的屬性:-協助您進行相對和 （或） 絕對圖表座標的來回轉換。

trans-unit.source: - Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: -執行自訂繪圖使用 GDI +<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 此物件屬性用於繪製事件期間的圖表元素的位置。
